snippet.title: Rocket Valley Tycoon Trailer | Android
snippet.description:
Rocket Valley Tycoon in Google Play https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rocketcolastudio.rvtih&hl=en 

brings strategic incremental idle gameplay to the Space Race! 

City building, resource management and rocket development all meet up in a fun, polished retro-style incremental idle clicker. As a rocket building business tycoon, your mission is to harvest, build and craft your way to colonize outer space. Build railroads, extract resources and tap, tap, tap your way to an outer space empire!


== Rocket Valley Tycoon Features ==

• Clicker Gameplay: tap to extract resources to aid the space race

• Idle Farming: Let your Extractors do the work, farming resources while you’re idle

• Strategic Idle game: Tap to gather the right resources you need to build your rocket

• Manage resources: study the tech tree carefully to extract the best materials

• Upgrade materials: process resources in Factories

• Build rockets: combine upgraded parts to construct your rocket

• Space adventure awaits - Blast off in your rocket ship to colonize space!

• Construct railroads to transport materials

• Tap quests from the citizens of each area will help you level up and earn coins

• Upgrade cities to boost the area and unlock resources

• City Building and resource transport goes further with train networks

== Download now to build your rocket business empire and colonize space! ==

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Developed by Rocket Cola Studio 

"Prosperity" music theme composed by Tormod Garvin https://soundcloud.com/tormod-garvin 

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Let's connect! 

- https://www.facebook.com/rocketcolastudio/
- https://www.facebook.com/RVTGame/ 
- https://twitter.com/RocketColaSt 
- https://gr.pinterest.com/rocketcolastudio/rocket-valley-tycoon/
